creator: SHIMANO INC.
descriptionHtml:
Update Your Bike Experience With E-TUBE RIDE
■Enhance your lifestyle and enjoy a new discovery on everyday rides.
■Have more fun cycling than usual as you can check your bike condition while riding.
■Have more fun planning the next ride as you can visualize today's ride experience.

*1 Cannot be connected to SC-E8000
*2 To use all the functions, register with SHIMANO ID.
*3 Some functions are not available in certain regions.
This is a cycle computer app offered by SHIMANO.

■ Searching for routes to your destination
　- You can search for bicycle routes to your destination.
　- The routes can be displayed on the map in the app.
■ Displaying and logging your rides
　- Traveling routes, speed, and cadence can be displayed and logged.
　- Logs can be shared on Strava.
■ Using a Bluetooth LE connection to gain access to more detailed data
　- You can gain access to the information obtained from the speed sensor and cadence sensor.
     Devices that support Bluetooth®LE communication profile (CSCP＝Cycling Speed and Cadence Profile) can be connected.
　- You can gain access to more detailed information by connecting to a SHIMANO STEPS bicycle or DI2 bicycle.
　　Battery level, traveling range, gear position, assist power, etc.
* Some functions are only available to logged in users who live in North America, European Economic Area (EEA) countries, or Japan.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-Possible to use as cycle computer, without the need to connect with SHIMANO STEPS system from this version.
-Adapted for Di2 bicycles.
-Adopted for speed sensor and cadence sensor.
-Functional items added.
-New function added on the setting screen.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Added speed graph and E-BIKE battery consumption on the ride log screen.

title: E-TUBE RIDE

creator: SHIMANO INC.
descriptionHtml:
Update Your Bike Experience with E-TUBE RIDE
■ Connect to SHIMANO CONNECT Lab where you can analyze your power or other various data to improve your cycling skills.
■ Enhance your lifestyle and enjoy new discoveries on everyday rides.
■ Check your bike status while riding to enjoy cycling even more.
■ Visualize today's ride experience and enjoy planning your next ride.

* Cannot be connected to SC-E8000
* Some functions are only available when you register with SHIMANO ID.
* Some functions are only available to logged in users who live in Australia, Canada, European Economic Area (EEA), Japan, New Zealand, North America, or Switzerland.

This is a cycle computer app offered by SHIMANO.
■ Search for routes to your destination
　- You can search for bicycle routes to your destination.
　- The routes can be displayed on the map in the app.

■ View and log your rides
　- Cycling routes, speed, cadence, power, and force vectors*1 can be viewed and logged.
　- Logs can be uploaded to SHIMANO CONNECT Lab automatically, allowing you to review your ride logs in further detail.
　- Logs can be shared on Strava.
*1 Compatible with Pioneer SGY-PM930H series pedaling monitor sensors

■ Use a Bluetooth LE connection to gain access to more detailed data
　- You can gain access to the information obtained from the speed sensor, cadence sensor*2, and power meter*3.
　- You can gain access to more detailed information by connecting to a SHIMANO STEPS bike or DI2 bike.
Battery level, traveling range, gear position, gear usage percentages, assist power, assist usage percentage, etc.
*2 Devices that support Bluetooth®LE communication profile (CSCP＝Cycling Speed and Cadence Profile) can be connected.
*3 Devices that support Bluetooth®LE communication profile (CPP＝Cycling Power Profile) can be connected.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
･ Data sharing with SHIMANO CONNECT Lab is now available
･ More intuitive, easy to read user interfaces
･ Various information can be viewed and logged including power and force vectors*1
･ A wide variety of data from previous rides is available to review
･ Compatible with power meters that support Bluetooth®LE Cycling Power Profile
*1 Compatible with Pioneer SGY-PM930H series pedaling monitor sensors

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: E-TUBE RIDE Ver. 2.0.1 (for Android) has been released to fix the issue that traveling distance data is not logged.

title: E-TUBE RIDE

creator: SHIMANO INC.
descriptionHtml:
FROM A SMARTPHONE TO THE CYCLING COMPUTER ON THE BIKE
■Connect with your bicycle
■Visualize your ride
■Show your route
■Record and review

* To use all the functions, register with SHIMANO ID.
* Cannot be connected to SC-E8000

This is a cycle computer app offered by SHIMANO.

■Connect with your bicycle
Use Bluetooth® LE to connect your phone to your SHIMANO STEPS E-BIKE, Di2 drivetrain, SHIMANO power meter*1, and other sensors*2 .
■Visualize your ride
Check the speed, assist mode, and Di2 gear position.
■Show your route
Search for the route to your destination and display it on a map.
■Record and review
Review your travel logs.
Share with Strava.
* 1 Compatible with devices that support Bluetooth®LE communication profile (Cycling Power Profile) and Pioneer SGY-PM930H series
* 2 Compatible with devices that support Bluetooth®LE communication profile (Cycling Speed and Cadence Profile, Heart Rate Profile)

* Some functions are only available to logged in users who live in Australia, Canada, European Economic Area (EEA) countries, Japan, New Zealand, Switzerland, Taiwan, and USA.
descriptionShort: FROM A SMARTPHONE TO THE CYCLING COMPUTER ON THE BIKE

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Added traditional Chinese.
- Adapted for heart rate sensor (Bluetooth Heart Rate Profile).
- General improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
■Changes
- Android 13 is now supported.
- New features of the new EP801/EP600 series products are now supported.
- General improvements.

■About SHIMANO ID*
On January 31, 2023, SHIMANO ID* became available in the following countries.
Brazil, Indonesia, Israel, Korea, Thailand and Turkey
* Creating an account that can be used with Shimano applications will give you access to more features such as ride logs and maps.
